title: Elon Musk’s Twitter Risks Big Fines From US Regulators
description: The company’s past failings place its security under scrutiny by the Federal Trade Commission until 2042. Any new mishaps could lead to heavy penalties.

title: Truth Social Is Rising as the Anti-Mastodon
description: Amid Twitter chaos and Donald Trump’s 2024 presidential bid, the conservative social network is having a moment of its own.
